pageContent: Objectives: The aim of this study was to monitor the impact of prostate cancer screening in a natural experiment by comparing prostate cancer mortality in Tyrol, Austria, where prostate-specific antigen (PSA) testing was made available at no charge, with the rest of Austria, where this screening was not introduced.

metaData.source:
[UCLA/RAND Cancer Prostate Index quality of life questionnaire after external beam radiotherapy for localized prostate cancer: repercussions of complications and quality of life in general]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/12765061/
